backtones.msg.ego.req.ego_door_closer: Move closer to push the door.
backtones.desc.ego.0: Right click to begin your journey of Majou Densetsu 2: Daimashikyou Galious
Shoots 2 projectiles, not good at swimming
backtones.advancements.alterego_used.des: Switch ego with Reflection of Alter Ego
backtones.advancements.ceramic_bow.descr: Ceramic arrows are more durable. It can even break blocks, why?
backtones.advancements.ceramic_bow.title: Ceramic Arrow
backtones.advancements.mantle.descriptio: Eat the cape to brave the boss - wait, why do we eat it?
backtones.advancements.mantle.title: Cape
backtones.advancements.pure_water.descri: Drink the Pure Water to brave the boss.
backtones.advancements.pure_water.title: Pure Water
backtones.advancements.red_bow.descripti: Red Bow. Basic ranged weapon. Consumes ammo.
backtones.advancements.red_bow.title: Red Arrow
backtones.advancements.root.description: Daimashikyou TaoismDeepLake stole your castle and your memory.
backtones.advancements.root.title: Welcome to Majou Densetsu 2 - Daimashikyou Galious
backtones.advancements.great_key_1.descr: Get Great Key No.1 to enter Forest.
backtones.advancements.great_key_1.title: Great Key No.1
backtones.advancements.map.description: Stop yelling and see the original game's map.
backtones.advancements.map.title: Map, in the Inventory
backtones.advancements.mongo_sword.descr: Cuts through the Alabaster wall as this game has no pickaxe.
backtones.advancements.mongo_sword.title: Mongolian Sword
backtones.advancements.angel_ring.descri: Would teleport you into dungeon entrance when finished
backtones.advancements.angel_ring.title: Angel Ring(WIP)
backtones.advancements.boots.description: Immune to hot floor. No you don't need to wear it. Achievement Buff.
backtones.advancements.boots.title: Boots
backtones.advancements.devil_wing.descri: Would teleport you between dungeon entrances when finished
backtones.advancements.devil_wing.title: Devil-o-wing
backtones.advancements.jar.description: Double the experience you get. Achievement Buff.
backtones.advancements.jar.title: Jar
backtones.advancements.lamp.description: Marks the boss room on your map. Achievement Buff.
backtones.advancements.lamp.title: Lamp
backtones.advancements.magical_rod.descr: Consumes no ammo for Majou ranged weapons. Achievement Buff.
backtones.advancements.magical_rod.title: Magical Rod
backtones.advancements.sabre.description: Doubles the damage you deal. Achievement Buff.
backtones.advancements.sabre.title: Sabre
backtones.advancements.salt.description: No effect. Used for entering revival room in original game.
backtones.advancements.salt.title: Salt
backtones.advancements.dungeon_1.descrip: [WIP]Seek the mongolian sword in the Forest and fight the skeletal dragon
backtones.advancements.dungeon_1.title: Dungeon No.1 Forest
backtones.advancements.dungeon_2.descrip: [WIP]Find the balloon in the volcano and fight the caterpillar
backtones.advancements.dungeon_2.title: Dungeon No.2 Volcano
backtones.advancements.dungeon_3.descrip: [WIP]Acquire the landmine and rolling fire to fight the boss
backtones.advancements.dungeon_3.title: Dungeon No.3 Catacomb
backtones.advancements.dungeon_4.descrip: [WIP]Acquire the fire to fight the boss
backtones.advancements.dungeon_4.title: Dungeon No.4 Crystal-cave
backtones.advancements.dungeon_5.descrip: [WIP]Break the curse and face the Daimashikyou
backtones.advancements.dungeon_5.title: Dungeon No.5 Finale
